About

I got into IT around the year of 2015, late but I guess it was just in time, passion still growing and since I was just the "IT guy" at a company called Labimed things have changed, responsabilities grew and I was able to find the love of my life, programming!

My job is to make people's jobs easier and I love that! I work at Piperun CRM programming PHP on Laravel and keep studying and learning about development every single day.
